title: Greyfriars Bobby,
author: Atkinson, Eleanor (Stackhouse)
snippet: But most of these had gone adventuring in Swanston Dell, to return to the city by the gorge of Leith Water.

title: Greyfriars Bobby,
author: Atkinson, Eleanor (Stackhouse)
snippet: His hazel-brown eyes were still as bright and soft and deep as the sunniest pools of Leith Water.

title: Greyfriars Bobby,
author: Atkinson, Eleanor (Stackhouse)
snippet: Cannon all around them, and "theirs not to reason why," this little band stormed out Queensferry Street and went down, hand under hand, into the fairy underworld of Leith Water,
